description: schema for an AL Language Project File

publisher.description: Name of the publisher of the app package

brief.description: Brief description of the app package

version.description: Version of the app package in the format X.Y.U.Z

propagateDependencies.description: Specifies whether the dependencies of this project should be propagated as direct dependencies of projects that depend on this one.

dependencies.description: List of dependent packages for this app package

publisher.description: Publisher name of the dependent package

version.description: The minimum version of the dependent package in the format X.Y.U.Z

internalsVisibleTo.description: List of packages that can access internals in this package

EULA.description: URL to the End User License Agreement for the app package

help.description: URL to the help content for the app package

logo.description: Relative path to the app package logo from the root of the package

screenshots.description: Relative paths to screenshot files that should be contained in the app package

preprocessorSymbols.description: Define symbols that can be used in all source files

suppressWarnings.description: List of warning ids that the compiler should suppress. E.g. AL0604 or AA0215

platform.description: Version of the dependent platform in the format X.Y.U.Z

application.description: Version of the dependent application in the format X.Y.U.Z

test.description: Version of the dependent test framework in the format X.Y.U.Z

enumDescriptions: Replaced by Cloud; restricts use of APIs and .NET so that the app can be published to the cloud.
Replaced by OnPrem; allows the use of all APIs and .NET but does not allow publishing to the cloud.
Restricts use of APIs and .NET so that the app can be published to the cloud.
For on-premises; allows the use of all APIs and .NET but does not allow publishing to the cloud.

idRanges.description: An optional set of ranges for application object IDs. For all objects outside the range, a compilation error will be raised.

idRange.description: An optional range for application object IDs. For all objects outside the range, a compilation error will be raised.

enumDescriptions: Generate and utilize translation files in xliff format
Generate translation entries for captions for all application objects
Exclude the generated translation file from the app
Switch off the option of using implicit withs
Generate translation entries in the template translation file for locked labels

features.description: Optional/experimental compiler features can be enabled by specifying them.

showMyCode.description: Allows the code to be debugged from other extensions when it has been published. The default setting is false.

contextSensitiveHelpUrl.description: Defines the base help URL for objects defined in this extension. The URL can contain a placeholder for the user locale: {0}.

helpBaseUrl.description: The base of the help URL that overrides the default help URL. The URL must contain a placeholder for the user locale: {0}.

supportedLocales.description: List of locales supported by this app in the format <languageCode>-<CountryCode> i.e. en-US, en-CA, da-DK. The first locale on the list is considered the default.

applicationInsightsKey.description: Partner specific Azure Application Insights Key. Telemetry from this extension will be published to the relevant Azure resource.

keyVaultUrls.description: The URLs of up to two Azure Key Vaults in the format https://<keyvaultname>.vault.azure.net. AL code in this extension will be able to read secrets in these key vaults. Specify a second key vault to be resilient in case the first key vault is unavailable.

runtime.description: The version of the runtime that the project is targeting. The project can be published to the server with an earlier or the same runtime version.
